app.name: Swap Requester
app.short_description: Easily swap the current requester with another CC collaborator
app.long_description: This app allows you to easily swap the current requester with another collaborator on the ticket. This is useful when the requester is not the person who is actually discussing the issue.
app.installation_instructions: Simply click install. Once installed, you can click the app icon in the ticket reply tray to swap the requester.
